snippet.title: Game Gear Longplay [009] Phantasy Star Adventures
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

It is the first Game Gear based on the Phantasy Star series. The game takes place on the planets of the Algol system during the same time of the second game. Like the advantures in Phantasy Star II Text Adventures, it's Text Based. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
